item.description:
We'd like to welcome you all to our yearly Holiday Networking Party. We will have a cash bar, snacks, raffles and games! We are very excited to end this great year on a high note. Since we are in the spirit of giving, we are waiving the guest fee for this networking event. Feel free to bring your co-workers, business partners or family! Oh, and make sure to bring plenty of business cards because our normal meetings average well over 60 investors! We hope to see you all next week on 12/5 at 7pm! Cheers, Rhiannon McHugh

Check our website for the updated speaker schedule. www.newenglandreia.com


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.
Cheslmford, MA 01824
When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month
Admission Fees

Guests: $20.00 at the Door
 


Ask about getting YOUR membership today! 

www.newenglandreia.com
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.

group.name: New England Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: Holiday Networking Party! - Free Event
